title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 28.3 - Designation of rated investment securities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 28.3 - Designation of rated investment securities

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby designates as independent rating
services for the purposes of Banking Law, section 103(1)(i), Moody's Investors

Service, Inc., Standard & Poor's Corporation, and Fitch Investors Service

Inc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
28.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
